Burbank.Big Brother: Over the Top: Big Brother: Over the Top (or BBOTT for short) is a spin-off American reality television series of the show Big Brother that aired exclusively online. The season premiered on September 28, 2016 and ended after 65 days with a season finale on December 1, 2016 only on CBS All Access, an over-the-top subscription streaming service. The season was officially announced by CBS on August 3, 2016, while Big Brother 18 was still in progress.
